title: Love Letter to a Female Reader
description: An intimate correspondence to a female reader by an erotica author, Love Letter to a Female Reader is a missive filled with sexual imaginings and what-ifs. The author imagines a scenario wherein the two share the affections of a beautiful and exciting man, and describes it in vivid detail to a beloved reader â€” you.This f/f/m story contains mature subject matter (explicit sex) and is intended for an adult audience.This original short story by Victoria Primrose is 3300 words, or approximately 13 pages.First Edition. Originally published February 20, 2013.
author: Victoria Primrose
